subject: Replacement gas pedal
description_text: Hi I recently purchased the Simsonn Plus X pedal and the wire for the gas pedal snapped apart. Could I purchase a replacement gas pedal?

conversations.body_text: Hi Brandon Le,  You may visit a local computer repair shop to re-crimp an RJ11 4P4C connector, following the brake pedal wiring order as a reference. If this does not resolve the issue, we will send you a replacement throttle pressure sensor for installation. Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and shipping address so we can arrange the next steps.Â
